bug.author: rakeshmothukuru1
bug.summary: Information about Keras Tuner is missing in tensorflow.org website
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>URL(s) with the issue:</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://youtu.be/aNrqaOAt5P4?list=PLQY2H8rRoyvzuJw20FG82Lgm2SZjTdIXU&t=660>https://youtu.be/aNrqaOAt5P4?list=PLQY2H8rRoyvzuJw20FG82Lgm2SZjTdIXU&t=660</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>Description of issue (what needs changing):</denchmark-h>
In the <denchmark-link:https://youtu.be/aNrqaOAt5P4?list=PLQY2H8rRoyvzuJw20FG82Lgm2SZjTdIXU&t=660>TF Dev Summit 2020</denchmark-link> , Paige Bailey has talked about and has shown its implementation. I liked the functionality but I couldn't information/documentation about it in <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/>tensorflow.org site</denchmark-link> . <denchmark-h:h3>Clear description:</denchmark-h>
This being a New Functionality, the documentation about that functionality in the Website would help the Community. <denchmark-h:h3>Correct links</denchmark-h>
Is the link to the source code correct? : N/A <denchmark-h:h3>Parameters defined</denchmark-h>
Are all parameters defined and formatted correctly?: N/A <denchmark-h:h3>Returns defined</denchmark-h>
Are return values defined? : N/A <denchmark-h:h3>Raises listed and defined</denchmark-h>
Are the errors defined? : N/A <denchmark-h:h3>Usage example</denchmark-h>
Is there a usage example? N/A

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/rakeshmothukuru1>@rakeshmothukuru1</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://blog.tensorflow.org/2020/01/hyperparameter-tuning-with-keras-tuner.html>This TensorFlow Blog post</denchmark-link> about Keras Tuner points to the official <denchmark-link:https://github.com/keras-team/keras-tuner>GitHub repo</denchmark-link> , which has the link to the <denchmark-link:https://keras-team.github.io/keras-tuner/>Keras Tuner documentation</denchmark-link> . Could you please check these link and let us know if it helps? Thanks!

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/amahendrakar>@amahendrakar</denchmark-link> , In my opinion, it will be better to add the documentation in Tensorflow.org site because many people refer that site rather than many different sites. If this Functionality has to be used along with Tensorflow, then its documentation should be present in the Official Tensorflow Website.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/rakeshmothukuru1>@rakeshmothukuru1</denchmark-link> Keras tuner is a separate package that is not integrated in tensorflow but we can use it by installing and importing it. So, that might be the reason why its not included in tensorflow.org
We have an example on the site now: <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/tutorials/keras/keras_tuner>https://www.tensorflow.org/tutorials/keras/keras_tuner</denchmark-link>
